action.general_scene_description: The screenshot shows a calendar application open on a desktop. The calendar is open to the week of November 11-17, 2024, and Saturday, November 16th is highlighted.  A pop-up window shows the details of an event scheduled for Sunday, November 17th at 3 PM. The event is titled "Client Meeting: Fujitsu". There is also another event visible for the same time called "Important meeting with Boss"
action.mouse_action: The mouse cursor is hovering over the "Monday, November 11th" column.
action.program_description: A calendar application displaying the week of November 11-17, 2024.
